reviewText: These are transfers from the famous TV series. The video is a bit grainy perhaps due to the source material age. If you enojoyed this series as a child seeing as an adult is illuminating. Much of the drama is created by effects, but part of the fun is catching the overdubs and trock photography that you missed as a child. 4 stars due to the grainy video
I can remember watching this on tv I liked then and I still do
Great shows. Brings backs lots of Sunday evening memories.

Bought this product (VHS)for my grandson and mailed it to him
unopened.  I cannot gived a review since I didn't see it.  As
far as delivery -- was on time, packaged well, no problems
Satisfied.
Lenore Chicka

Highly recommended to people of all ages.  I loved this show as a child and now, seeing it again I still love it.  Great family viewing.  Entertaining and educational.  Wish we could get ALL episodes.

I first checked this out at the library. At first I thought my son would be bored with the music and photography, considering that it was done decades ago, but he was entranced with them. So he was thrilled when we bought this set. For animal lovers, who like Marlin Perkin's personality, get it. It's a change from Steve Irwin's style.
